attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch out terribly! Every time i would open it my phone would just completely shut down!! Now how am i supposed to support trump :(

attributes.title: So unconstitutional
attributes.review:
This app alone is blasphemous. So many glitches. My phone crashed too many times. Not worth the time or effort. Would give 0 stars if I could. 

🧚🏿✨ just take the app down Donald✨🧚🏿

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review:
Before I downloaded it my phone was fine and ran smoothly but when I downloaded it my
phone got super glitchy. 0/10 wouldn't recommend!

attributes.title: Waste of my time
attributes.review: I’m so upset that I actually pressed download on this stupid app. The content is like a four year wrote it and I could’ve left a 1 star rating without doing this song and dance. Bad. Bigly bad. Bad.

attributes.title: WASTE OF TIME
attributes.review: I can’t believe this app is even real! This app asked me for my personal information so I gave it to them. Two weeks later my mother had a dinosaur in her leg and we were told it was because of this app DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WANT A T-REX TO BE IN YOUR LEG!

attributes.title: Terrible!
attributes.review: Absolutely awful. At no point did i ever expect this to be good but this was just atrocious. I was hoping for something a little better considering trump is so rich but instead we got this trashy app.

attributes.title: The rat murderer
attributes.review: This app killed my pet rat!! They literally took him and made him cook at a 5 star restaurant in France. They forcefully had him control a grown man who didn’t know how to cook by stuffing him under his hat and tugging on his hair! I do not recommend if you love your pets :(

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.review: I went to go download this app cause i wanted to see what is up with my president🤪 but it made my phone glitch and now i cant spell chicken because it autocorrects to chicken 😫worst app ever and it very slow and it made my phone hot😢😭
where to begin? this app is slow, SO many glitches, not easy to navigate, is outdated, and the list goes on. i think this should be taken off the app store ASAP!!!

attributes.title: KILLED MY DOG
attributes.review: This app has secret malware instilled by the Chinese government to kill and steal your pets so they can consume them. Truly I cannot believe the rump administration could be infiltrated like this. I guess our country really does need new leadership after all.
